data.eml:eml: A new microphthalmic stygobitic Graptodytes Seidlitz from Morocco, with a molecular phylogeny of the genus (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ribera, Ignacio, Faille, Arnaud (2010): A new microphthalmic stygobitic Graptodytes Seidlitz from Morocco, with a molecular phylogeny of the genus (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae). Zootaxa 2641: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198600
